name: Open Government Data Portal of Kerala
description: The Open Government Data Portal of Kerala (kerala.data.gov.in) serves as a vital platform for advancing the Open Data initiative of the Government of Kerala. Designed for use by various departments and organizations, the portal enables the publication of datasets, documents, services, tools, and applications collected for public access. Its primary aim is to enhance transparency in government operations while fostering innovative applications of government data, offering diverse perspectives.
